name: My Little Bomb
description:
Alternative reality, North Korea led by Kem Jong-En wants to conquer the whole world. To this end, the country's leadership has decided to create many nuclear and atomic bombs, as well as other weapons of mass destruction. You will grow one of them.
You are a scientist and engineer of the North Korean army and you need to grow your small nuclear bomb.
Features:
-Ability to grow your little nuclear BOMB!
-Ability to be scientists in an alternative reality, in North Korea
-A few backgrounds available for playing (USA, Korea)
-A few upgrades for the bomb, available for purchase (You can make a lolly-bomb with pink hair)
-A good "killer" of time. Have nothing to do? Click on an nuclear bomb!
-Simple and fun gameplay
-Steam Achievements
